title: Ready, Set, Bike!
description: It's spring! Time to prepare the bikes. In Ready, Set, Bike!, a boy and his dad check their bikes before they take a ride. Students have the opportunity to ask and answer questions as well as make inferences in this informative book. Detailed, supportive photographs, high-frequency words, and repetitive phrases support readers.
meta: brakes, fasten, gears, helmet, inner tube, oil, patch, pump, smoothly
Ask and answer questions to understand text
Make Inferences/Draw Conclusions : Make inferences / Draw conclusions
Short Vowel Sounds : Discriminate short vowel /a/ sound
Simple Predicates : Recognize and locate simple predicates
Alphabetical Order : Understand and arrange words in alphabetical order

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
